product_name: Coleman Skin Smart Insect Repellent Aerosol Spray - 6 fl. oz.
long_description: Use Coleman Skin Smart(TM) insect repellent aerosol spray to keep annoying biting bugs at bay. DEET-free formula is effective against mosquitoes and ticks for up to 8 hrs.; active ingredient is IR3535(R). Formula dries quickly and is odorless and non-sticky. Aerosol spray goes on quickly and easily, and even sprays when the bottle is held upside down; locking cap prevents accidental spraying. Aluminum can is lighter than stainless steel and can be recycled.
short_description: Use Coleman Skin Smart(TM) insect repellent aerosol spray to keep annoying biting bugs at bay.
